protein.specific_function: Calretinin is a calcium-binding protein which is abundant in auditory neurons

reference.reference_text: Parmentier M: The human calbindins: cDNA and gene cloning. Adv Exp Med Biol. 1989;255:233-40.
Parmentier M, Lefort A: Structure of the human brain calcium-binding protein calretinin and its expression in bacteria. Eur J Biochem. 1991 Feb 26;196(1):79-85.
